1.caption_en:
The infographic outlines three strategic levels—L1 Portfolio (multi-market), L2 Market (single market), and L3 Platform (individual business)—with guiding questions for each level and associated tools/processes to explore ecosystems, market opportunity, and platform design.

{
  "artifact_type": "infographic",
  "title": "The tools and processes we created over the years help you to find answers to your challenges on the different levels",
  "language": "English",
  "layout": "landscape, three horizontal sections (L1, L2, L3) with diagrams on the left and tools thumbnails on the right",
  "color_palette": ["teal", "orange", "gray"],
  "levels": [
    {
      "level": "L1 - Portfolio Level (Multi-Market)",
      "focus": "Assessing a portfolio of business models across markets and defining ambition, engagement and investment strategy",
      "questions": [
        "How does my portfolio of business models look like?",
        "What is our overall ambition / vision?",
        "What are markets I should focus on? Select the right one to join?",
        "What is the right level of engagement?",
        "How to leverage resources / assets?",
        "How can we stand out against competitors?",
        "Where to invest?",
        "Where to partner?"
      ],
      "tools": ["Ecosystems Portfolio Map"]
    },
    {
      "level": "L2 - (Single) Market Level",
      "focus": "Understanding the market ecosystem, emerging needs, value pools, and how to integrate products, services and partnerships",
      "questions": [
        "How does the market ecosystem look like in the next years?",
        "What are emerging customer needs?",
        "What are growth opportunities / value pools?",
        "What are critical control points?",
        "What is our ambition for the market?",
        "How can we create a functional integrated portfolio of products, services and platform plays?",
        "Who are relevant partners and how to collaborate?",
        "How to govern all activities?"
      ],
      "tools": ["Market Exploration Process", "Ecosystem Journey Canvas", "Functional Integration Map"]
    },
    {
      "level": "L3 - Platform Level (Individual Business)",
      "focus": "Defining platform business model, key stakeholders, network effects, core services and trust-building",
      "questions": [
        "What is the platform business model?",
        "Who are the key stakeholders (consumers, producers, partners) on my platform?",
        "How to grow and evolve with network effects?",
        "What are key services we need to provide to help the key stakeholders to grow via the platform?",
        "How to build trust?"
      ],
      "tools": ["Platform Innovation Kit (incl. process and canvases)"]
    }
  ],
  "visual_elements": [
    "concentric circular ring diagrams representing user/market layers",
    "arrows indicating flow between levels",
    "zoomed inset of platform diagram",
    "thumbnails of process and canvas templates beside each level"
  ],
  "intended_audience": ["strategy teams", "innovation managers", "product and platform leaders"]
}
